headline: FactSet AI Push Tests Client Loyalty As Growth Pressures Mount
summary: FactSet Research Systems (NYSE:FDS) has expanded its partnership with Kepler Cheuvreux to distribute Aftermarket Research across its platform, incorporating proprietary AI capabilities. The company has also released an AI Doc Ingest feature in beta for its Cobalt private markets analytics platform, aimed at streamlining document handling for private capital managers. FactSet is making these product moves at a time when its share price sits at $205.79 and its longer-term returns have been...

headline: Is FactSet (FDS) Now Attractive After A 54% One-Year Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether FactSet Research Systems is starting to look interesting on price, this article will walk through what its current market valuation really implies. The stock last closed at US$205.79, with returns of 1.3% over 7 days but declines of 28.7% over 30 days, 27.8% year to date, and 54.4% over 1 year that may have shifted how investors view both its potential and its risks. Recent coverage of FactSet has focused on its role as a long standing provider of financial data...
